net.codemusic.smartears
Class SettingsManager

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.codemusic.smartears.SettingsManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISettings, ISettingsManager
public class SettingsManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISettingsManager, ISettings

This class is repsonible for storing the user's current preference settings

See Also:
ISettingsManager, ISettings
